detail_description: To Psaraki is a charming restaurant located in the beautiful area of Vlychada, offering a traditional dining experience with delicious seafood and some meat options. The menu features a wide variety of appetizers with Greek and Mediterranean influences, showcasing simple yet high-quality dishes based on traditional Greek cuisine. Notable items include the fish soup and shrimp spaghetti made with fresh local ingredients.
name: To Psaraki

excerpt: Traditional local dishes served in a laid-back hillside restaurant that has a patio & sea views.
detail_description: Nestled in the quaint village of Exo Gonia, Metaxi Mas is a charming hillside restaurant offering a laid-back atmosphere and stunning sea views. This family-run establishment serves up traditional Cretan dishes with generous portion sizes and complimentary raki, creating an inviting and friendly environment for guests to unwind.
name: Metaxi Mas

detail_description: Nestled in the picturesque area of Pyrgos, Selene Restaurant offers a breathtaking panoramic view of Santorini's vineyards in Akrotiri and Megalochori. With almost 30 years of experience, this renowned restaurant is celebrated for its new Greek cuisine and fine dining. Housed within an 18th-century Catholic Monastery, the restaurant exudes elegance with its arches, palm trees, and a charming fountain.
name: Selene Restaurant

detail_description: The Athenian House is a top culinary destination in Santorini, located in Imerovigli with stunning sunset views of the caldera. It offers a relaxed and refined atmosphere and is known for its Michelin-starred chef Jero Serres' creations. The restaurant has received multiple awards and is listed among the 50 best restaurants in the world.
name: The Athenian House

detail_description: Aroma Avlis, nestled within the enchanting Artemis Karamolegos Winery in Exo Gonia, Santorini, is a culinary gem that should not be missed during your island adventure. This unique establishment combines a winery and restaurant experience, allowing guests to indulge in authentic Greek dishes crafted from seasonal local ingredients like tomatoes and fava beans. The setting is simply delightful—imagine dining in a cozy courtyard surrounded by lush plants and aromatic herbs while gazing out at the stunning Aegean Sea.
name: Aroma Avlis

detail_description: Aktaion Restaurant in Firostefani, Santorini is a popular dining spot with stunning views of the famous sunsets and the volcano of Santorini. The restaurant offers high-quality dishes and remains open all year long, serving until late at night. With its prime location on the main road leading from Fira to Firostefani, Aktaion Restaurant provides a perfect setting for enjoying delicious meals while taking in breathtaking scenery.
name: Aktaion Restaurant

excerpt: Locally sourced meals offered in a white-tablecloth choice set on a clifftop terrace with sea views.
detail_description: Lycabettus Restaurant, situated at the Andronis Luxury Suites hotel in Santorini, offers locally sourced meals in an elegant setting with a breathtaking view of the sea. National Geographic Traveler has featured this restaurant for its exceptional location and dining experience. The restaurant's balcony provides a dreamy atmosphere under the starry sky, while Chef Nikos Leivadias crafts imaginative cuisine.
name: Lycabettus Restaurant

detail_description: La Maison is a renowned restaurant located in Santorini, Greece. It is one of the best dining spots in Firostefani, offering breathtaking views of the famous sunsets and the volcano of Santorini. The restaurant provides high-quality dishes and an unforgettable dining experience. With its prime location and excellent cuisine, La Maison is a must-visit for anyone looking to indulge in Greek gastronomy while enjoying stunning vistas.
name: La Maison

detail_description: 1800-Floga is a renowned restaurant located in an 1845-built mansion in Oia, known for its stunning sea views and award-winning gourmet cuisine. The establishment offers traditional Greek dishes with a modern twist, served in an atmospheric dining room or on a scenic rooftop garden. Some standout dishes include lamb chops with sweet and sour green apple sauce and fresh grouper on Santorinian sun-dried tomatoes and spicy capers.
name: 1800-Floga

excerpt: Unassuming restaurant serving local food including moussaka, seafood & meat dishes, plus wine.
detail_description: Anogi is a modest eatery in Imerovigli, Santorini that offers a variety of local dishes such as moussaka, seafood, and meat along with a selection of wines. The restaurant provides an unassuming dining experience for visitors to savor authentic flavors. It's located in close proximity to other popular restaurants and attractions in the area.
name: Anogi

detail_description: Perched on a hilltop with stunning views of the caldera, Volkan on the Rocks is a charming brewery in Firostefani, Santorini. This laid-back spot offers Greek beers and a variety of light meals, along with an outdoor cinema for an unforgettable experience. The sun-soaked terrace provides the perfect setting to enjoy a delightful array of hot and cold mezes made from local ingredients, paired with a refreshing pint of Volkan craft beer.
name: Volkan on the Rocks

excerpt: A traditional local menu is paired with a wine list at this snug venue set in a historic building.
detail_description: Nestled in a charming 1912 building, Roka Oia is a delightful gem that captures the essence of traditional Greek dining. Located just a short stroll from the bustling main strip of Oia, this cozy restaurant offers an inviting atmosphere perfect for romantic evenings or casual meals with friends. While it may not boast sunset views, Roka compensates with its innovative take on classic Greek dishes like tomato fritters and grilled squid paired with black garlic aioli.
name: Roka Oia

detail_description: Lauda Restaurant, located in Oia, is a beloved dining spot that has been serving locals and travelers for decades. The menu features Greek-inspired dishes with Mediterranean influences, catering to various tastes. Chef Emmanuel Renaut, known for his Michelin-starred expertise, utilizes ingredients from the restaurant's garden to create exceptional flavors while honoring local traditions.
name: Lauda Restaurant

detail_description: Yalos is a beachfront restaurant located on Exo Gialos beach near Fira, offering a modern twist on traditional Greek dishes such as souvlaki and stuffed squid. The boho-luxe decor and DJ music create an atmospheric vibe reminiscent of Ibiza. Visitors can rent sunbeds for the day and enjoy the beach bar menu while watching the sunset over the Aegean Sea with a refreshing cocktail in hand.
name: Yalos

detail_description: Candouni is a charming family-owned restaurant located in Oia, offering a warm and romantic atmosphere. The candlelit patio, traditional Greek music, and intimate dining rooms create a cozy setting for enjoying authentic Greek cuisine. The restaurant is housed in a centuries-old sea captain's house with jasmine-shaded gardens and antique-filled salons. The owner is known for being passionate about providing phenomenal customer service and encourages socialization between tables, creating memorable dining experiences for travelers.
name: Candouni

detail_description: Located on a small beach along the south coast, Nikolas is a traditional taverna that has been in the same family for three generations. It offers a solid and hearty meal away from the busy atmosphere found elsewhere on the island. Many of their fish dishes are caught by owner Nikolas himself, while their meat dishes feature meats sourced from their family farm. This authentic Greek restaurant can be easily found in Fira with directions from locals or simply by exploring its charming streets.
name: Nikolas

detail_description: To Pinakio is a charming meze taverna located in Kamari town, offering affordable and tasty snacks accompanied by traditional local music. The ambiance is delightful, and the staff is known for their friendliness. The establishment provides uncomplicated service with great value and fantastic tasting dishes, including traditional favorites like fava beans and eggplant puree paired with locally produced wines. Visitors can expect an enjoyable experience with excellent acoustics while indulging in a variety of meze selections.
name: To Pinakio
address: Panagias Myrtidiotissas, Epar.Od. Mesarias-Archeas Thiras, Kamari 847 00, Greece

excerpt: Elevated dishes served in an intimate white-tablecloth eatery that has a terrace & caldera views.
detail_description: Ambrosia Restaurant is a charming white-tablecloth eatery with a terrace offering stunning views of the caldera. It's known for its Greek and Mediterranean cuisine, featuring fresh seafood, meat dishes, and vegetarian creations. The menu includes delectable options like beef fillet with Vinsanto wine and truffles, sea bass grilled in lemon sauce, and risotto tagliatelle with Santorini cherry tomatoes.
name: Ambrosia Restaurant
address: Cliffside Terrace at Village Center, Oía 847 02, Greece

excerpt: Classic dishes, small plates, pasta & risotto are served at this casual restaurant with a patio.
detail_description: Ouzeri is a casual restaurant located in Fira, offering classic Greek dishes and unique cuisine with a twist. The restaurant provides a cozy atmosphere for guests to enjoy small plates, pasta, and risotto on its patio. It is conveniently situated just off the main walkway, close to Santorini Bus Stop 10 and the Museum of Prehistoric Thera.
name: Ouzeri

detail_description: Nestled in the charming Oia, Red Bicycle is a must-visit upscale restaurant housed in a 19th-century mansion. Its Greek creative cuisine offers traditional flavors with an elevated twist. The chic interior adorned with Maria Callas photographs leads to a stunning terrace boasting panoramic views of the caldera and Santorini's iconic white buildings and blue-domed churches.
name: Red Bicycle
